title: I have ping in the high hundreds while my brother has 40 ping ???
body:
Okay, so I'm in my room with my brother playing league. He's in game and I'm in game. We both have around 40 ping and then I start spiking to the hundreds like 500-800 ping, while he's still at 40 ping??? I'm so confused. How the hell do I fix this? 

{{item:3070}} pls help {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Check for damage/loose connection to your cables.
Are you on wifi while brother is on LAN?
Or both on wifi and your wifi card is lower quality than his?


protip: If you're on wifi, don't be. ;)

Hmmmm that's a little awkward. There might be something a little different with your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) that is causing this crazy ping spike. Check out all the steps in that guide, and if that doesn't help let's be sure to check for packet loss using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) as well.
